dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Ranks Element Occurrences (EOs) within an element (species or community) based on a variety of attributes.

This tool requires outputs from the "Attribute Element Occurrences" tool as inputs, and returns outputs needed as inputs to the "Build Conservation Portfolio" tool.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Virginia Natural Heritage Program (Kirsten R. Hazler)

tool.name: score_eo

param.name: in_procEOs
param.dialogReference:
Input feature class with attributed Element Occurrences.

This is an output generated by the "Attribute Element Occurrences" tool.

param.name: in_sumTab
param.dialogReference:
Input table summarizing the numbers of Element Occurrences per element included in the prioritization process.

This is an output generated by the "Attribute Element Occurrences tool.

param.name: out_gdb
param.dialogReference: Output Geodatabase. Output files with standard names will be written here.

param.name: ysnMil
param.displayname: Use military land as ranking factor?
param.dialogReference:
Determines whether to use military status of land as a ranking factor.

  • If this box is unchecked (default), EOs will be treated equally regardless of the amount of land under military ownership.

  • If the box is checked, EOs with a greater portion of land owned by the military will rank lower than EOs with a lower portion or no land owned by the military, all else equal.

param.name: ysnYear
param.displayname: Use observation year as ranking factor?
param.dialogReference:
Determines whether to use observation year as a ranking factor.

  • If this box is unchecked, EOs will be treated equally regardless of last observation date

  • If this box is checked (default), EOs with a more recent last observation date rank higher than older EOs, all else equal.

NOTE: EOs older than the hard cutoff date will be excluded regardless of whether the box is checked.

tool.summary:
Ranks Element Occurrences (EOs) within an element (species or community) based on a variety of attributes.

This tool requires outputs from the "Attribute Element Occurrences" tool as inputs, and returns outputs needed as inputs to the "Build Conservation Portfolio" tool.
